definitions: the rear surface of the human body from the shoulders to the hips
the part of a chair, sofa, etc., against which a person sitting rests their back
the reverse side of a piece of paper or object
the rear or lower part or surface of anything
examples: He has a tattoo on his back.
The chair has a cushioned back.
Please sign on the back of the document.
The back of the house needs painting.
